name: Desktop Beach Girls
description:
Do you miss summer? Bring back that feeling of warmth and relaxation with hot babes in swimsuits on your desktop!

Add to your screen one of five girls in a beach style, which can be customized and placed anywhere on the desktop, set her to the dance that you like best, so that she dances brightly on top of all the windows, and you can have a pleasant vacation for a while without leaving your computer!


  • Five gorgeous, diverse girls for every taste 👧👧🏻👧🏼👧🏽👧🏿
  • Beach theme, allowing you to escape from routine for a while and immerse yourself in an atmosphere of relaxation 🏖️
  • Move, twist and resize the girl so that she fits perfectly on your screen 👀
  • Customize the girl, change clothes, hair color and body shapes to suit your taste 😏
  • Choose a dance that suits your mood. Calm? Dynamic? Or something more interesting? 💃
  • Listen to relaxing music 🎧
  • Physics of all parts of the body when dancing and moving, don’t overdo it 👉🏻👈🏻
  • Possibility of playing with one hand, ideally combined with the previous point 💪🏻
